additional_info:
Storeroom, Wardrobe, Furniture, Technique, Telephone, Internet, Cable-TV, Security, Alarm System, corner, Elevator, Generator, Heating system: central, Hot water: gas, electricity 
 Fabulous new apartment with gorgeous views of the snowtopped mountains of the Caucasus, Vake Park, and Turtle Lake forest. In fully finished condition with all amenities, fully independent power, heating, and water supply. 5 minutes walk from downtown Vake, 15 minutes walk from Turtle Lake! Very quiet, very clean air, beautiful sunlit rooms. Spacious apartment, large windows, high ceilings, with concierge, garden, gardener, elevator, lovely italian-tiled bathrooms, marble fireplace, solid beech parket flooring, and lovely finishing touches. Absolutely fabulous brand new property.
